overview:
Born and raised in New Zealand, Michael currently bases himself in the sunny city of London. Over his career, he has built an impressive portfolio of experience working with businesses and brands across the globe, including the likes of Google, Red Bull, Heineken, Last.fm, T-Mobile, Kraft Foods Ltd and YouTube.

Now, Managing Partner at rehabstudio - an independent digital creative-technology company based in Belfast and London. Michael has guided the company through years of growth from a boutique shop to one of Deloitteâ€™s Fast 50 growing tech companies.

In 2012 Michael co-founded Robot Corp a Pre Seed investment company, engineering ideas into digital businesses & products.
